messages.title: Your choice at the General Election
messages.content: Balancing the books fairly. Bringing down Britain's debt while protecting the education budget and investing £8 billion a year extra in the NHS.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Balancing the books fairly and bringing down Britain's debt.
Investing £8 billion a year extra in the NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour are out of the race in many parts of the country
